ComicInfo.Summary: Greed is a gilded dragon…and it’s staring two battered and bloodied combat exorcists right in the eye. Its first attack is an offer! After all, Syd and Ellen deserve a prize for their accomplishments. They deserve praise for fighting deeper into the Hellscraper than any exorcists ever have. But sadly, be it prize or praise, there’s not enough for both of them. And Greed’s gift comes with a price – a lifetime as part of its gilded gallery, its treasure hoard of fallen warriors living perfect fantasies of the mind as their bodies are chromed and coveted. Only by rejecting everything they’ve ever asked for can our heroes exorcize Greed…and even if they do, can they survive the demonic sin’s parting gift?
